articles.description: Love Island's Laura and Iain first started dating back in 2017 and now it seems they are preparing for a wedding after opening up about her life in an interview
articles.content:
Laura Whitmore seems to have finally confirmed she and long-term love Ian Stirling are engaged.
 The 34-year-old, who took over from tragic friend Caroline Flack as Love Island host, gave the nod to an article saying the pair are taking the next step. 
 Lau… [+1941 chars]

articles.author: Sam Elliott
articles.title: Molly Mae Hague and Tommy Fury pranked into thinking they landed a James Corden interview - Mirror Online
articles.description: After putting Katie Hopkins in her place by flying her to Prague to collect a made-up award, Josh Pieters returned by pretending James Corden was talking to the Love Island stars on the Late Late Show
articles.content:
Molly Mae Hague and Tommy Fury are the latest stars to fall victim to notorious celebrity prankster Josh Pieters.
He made the oblivious Love Island finalists think they were being interviewed by James Corden on the Late Late Show.
Clips of the US favourite … [+1929 chars]

articles.author: Sonny Cohen
articles.title: The 7 Kent music venues that may disappear forever because of coronavirus - Kent Live
articles.description: Due to social distancing rules, many of Kent's pubs, bars and clubs have been forced to close
articles.content:
With pubs, bars and clubs forced to shut due to the coronavirus pandemic, Kent's most beloved music venues are at risk of closing down for good.
Seven venues across the county have signed up to the Save Our Venues campaign in an attempt to ensure they are ab… [+9541 chars]

articles.author: Robin Denselow
articles.title: Tony Allen obituary - The Guardian
articles.description: Masterful drummer and co-creator of Afrobeat, the fusion of funk, jazz and African styles that he pioneered with Fela Kuti
articles.content: On 12 and 13 March there were two concerts in the Church of Sound series at St James the Great Church in Clapton, east London. They were staged in the round, with both the audience and the small band of brass, keyboards and guitar circled around the star play… [+6891 chars]

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Coronavirus: Michael Palin shares his hospital stories for NHS charity book - BBC South East Wales
articles.description: The Monty Python shares his lighter moments in hospital, and how humour helps us all.

articles.author: Sam Stevenson
articles.title: Kate heartbreak: Duchess reveals 'extraordinary' concern in emotional plea amid UK crisis - Express
articles.description: KATE, the Duchess of Cambridge surprised key workers and new parents with a motivational Zoom call over the weekend to offer her heartfelt support during the devastating coronavirus pandemic.

articles.title: Kate Middleton makes 'virtual visit' to new parents during coronavirus crisis - The Sun
articles.description: THE Duchess of Cambridge made a virtual bedside visit to new mums and dads. Kate, 38, cooed over newborns in a video call to parents and midwives coping with...
